title: Contamination
description: After another booze binge, journalist Dean Sharp wakes to find the world has changed. He is trapped in his home, while outside the city is burning and in the streets people are killing each other in wanton acts of violence.Isolated and alone, Dean must face his own demons as he tries to make sense of events that have an odd familiarity about them. Soon he will question if the terrible dreams plaguing his sleep are the result of alcohol addiction or memories of a past he is not meant to remember.The present is an endless nightmare of slaughter and madness. And the future of all mankind hangs in the balance.
author: Dave Jeffery
